command.editing.continue.title: Markdown Copilot: Continue
command.editing.indentQuote.title: Markdown Copilot: Indent Quote Line
command.editing.outdentQuote.title: Markdown Copilot: Outdent Quote Line
config.decorations.inactiveContextOpacit: Controls the opacity of inactive context lines, `0.0` is completely transparent, while a value of `1.0` is completely opaque.
config.openAI.apiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key. Can be obtained from <https://platform.openai.com/api-keys>.
config.openAI.model.description: Can specify the models listed in [Models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/models).
config.openAI.systemMessage.description: Controls the Copilot's behavior, allowing changes to its personality or specific behavior instructions.
config.openAI.temperature.description: Can specify a value between `0.0` and `1.0`. Higher values like `0.8` will make the output more random, while lower values like `0.2` will make it more focused and deterministic. [FAQ](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-generation/how-should-i-set-the-temperature-parameter) helps to determine the value.
